Text:
just a quick heads up - since this isn't a specific vlad set, it might be worth uploading a preview picture to something like imgbam.

For a smaller set (50mb) it probably wouldn't be too much of an issue, but because this is a larger download, people might be put off because they're not sure what they're downloading.

Why should they be banned?  Vlad Studios is a very well known graphic artist, and this is the pictures section is it not?  I really appreciate the images dusty, thanks a lot.  Looks like there are many I don't have here.
The description is 100% accurate, I don't see why you would get bent out of shape about it, it is exactly what it says it is.  Thanks again to uploader

Ahoy! This is Vlad Gerasimov from Vladstudio.com. Glad you liked my artworks enough to share them. I made HD images available for paid users for a reason - sounds crazy but that's how I make my living. So if you find yourself using my walls for some time, please consider registering at http://www.vladstudio.com/register
And yeah I know my style is boring for many people!

@DigieraMandela - well, what I really meant to say is that, yeah I understand this is a pirate bay, so it would be strange to ask people to register instead of downloading torrent... but I thought I'd at least try!
